name: Alien
description: Tool has a random bonus to Durability, Speed, and Attack that slowly takes effect over time.

name: Aquadynamic
description: Speed boost while underwater or it is raining. Underwater, tool will mine at normal speed.

name: Aridiculous
description: Mine faster and inflict more damage when it is hot and dry. If it is only dry, take a slight penalty instead.

name: Autosmelt
description: Items mined with this tool are smelted as if in a Furnace.

name: Baconlicious
description: 5% chance to drop bacon when killing mobs, 0.5% chance when breaking blocks.

name: Beheading
description: Each level adds a 10% chance to get the enemies head on kill. Beheading II is applied to cleavers by default when constructed.

name: Breakable
description: Arrows have a chance to break and cannot be retrieved.

name: Cheap
description: Tool gains an additional 5% to restored durability when repaired.

name: Cheapskate
description: Tool is 20% less durable than the stats of its components would suggest.

name: Cold-Blooded
description: 50% extra damage if the target is at full health.

name: Crude
description: 5% extra damage against unarmoured targets.

name: Crude II
description: 10% extra damage against unarmoured targets.

name: Crumbling
description: Double mining speed if the block doesn't require a tool to break.

name: Dense
description: Reduced chance of using durability if the tool is already damaged.

name: Depth Digger
description: Digs faster the lower the player is (approximately 1.03x faster per level below y=72).

name: Duritae
description: Each time the tool is used, 10% chance of using double durability, 40% chance to use none.

name: Ecological
description: 1 in 800 chance of repairing a point of durability every tick.

name: Enderference
description: Endermen cannot teleport away for a few seconds after being damaged.

name: Endspeed
description: Arrows travel instantly to where the player is aiming; no travel time.

name: Fire Storm
description: Bonus fire damage and sets hit mobs on fire.

name: Flammable
description: Blocking with this weapon sets attackers on fire and prevents the player from being damaged by fiery attacks.

name: Fractured
description: Deals 1.5 Hearts of bonus damage.

name: Freezing
description: Mob moves slower and slower the more they are hit.

name: Hellish
description: Deals 2 Hearts of bonus damage to Mobs that do not usually spawn in the Nether.

name: Holy
description: Deals 3 Hearts of bonus damage to undead enemies.

name: Hovering
description: Arrow moves slower but ignores gravity.

name: Insatiable
description: Hits after the first will deal progressively more bonus damage but also consume more and more durability.

name: Jagged
description: Tool does more damage as it loses durability, but mines slower.

name: Lightweight
description: 10% bonus mining speed and attack speed.

name: Magnetic
description: Item drops are drawn to the player.

name: Magnetic II
description: Item drops are drawn to the player at a wider range than Magnetic.

name: Momentum
description: Mining blocks increases the player's speed as long as they keep mining.

name: Petramor
description: When mining stone, there is a 10% chance to repair some durability.

name: Poisonous
description: Poison is inflicted on target when hit.

name: Precipitate
description: Tool speed is inversely proportional to remaining player health.

name: Prickly
description: Enemy sustains an additional 0.5 to 1.5 hearts of armor-penetrating damage when hit.

name: Sharp
description: Inflicts bleeding status effect on an enemy when hit, inflicting 0.5 hearts of damage per second for a few seconds.

name: Shocking
description: Running around, breaking blocks, or hitting things charges the player's tool. Hitting an enemy discharges it, dealing damage and providing a speed boost. Mining a block discharges it, giving a mining speed boost.

name: Slimey (Green)
description: Tool has a chance to spawn a green slime.

name: Slimey (Blue)
description: Tool has a chance to spawn a blue slime.

name: Spiky
description: Upon being hit, inflict 1/3 of the tool's damage value to the enemy as cactus damage. There is a short cooldown before the effect occurs again.

name: Splintering
description: Successive hits on the same mob inflicts more damage.

name: Splitting
description: Chance to fire 2 arrows instead of 1 upon firing. 2nd arrow does not have 100% accuracy.

name: Squeaky
description: Grants Silk Touch but negates all damage.

name: Stiff
description: Reduces damage to a maximum of 1 heart of damage when blocking.

name: Stalwart
description: Hitting an entity can bestow Resistance for 30 seconds.

name: Stonebound
description: Tool mines faster as it loses durability, but inflicts less damage.

name: Superheat
description: Deal bonus damage to enemies on fire.

name: Tasty
description: Tool has a chance to drop food when hitting a mob

name: Twilit
description: Tool operates faster in the Twilight Forest; it inflicts more damage outside the Twilight Forest.

name: Unnatural
description: The tool mines faster the higher its mining level is above the required one.

name: Well-Established
description: Slightly increased XP drop rate, and XP drops are larger.

name: Writable
description: +1 modifier slot.

name: Writable II
description: +2 modifier slots.

name: Veiled
description: Projectile will be invisible
